articles.title: Bitcoin halving fallout – ‘1st time in history’ update leaves miners wary - AMBCrypto News
articles.description: With Bitcoin's halving done and dusted, it was time to hit another milestone.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin’s hash rate has risen sharply since the halving
  • BTC’s price decline adversely affected mining profitability too

articles.title: Ban on non-compete agreements sends shockwave across Wall Street - Financial Times
articles.description: Financial companies scramble to rework contracts and tie down personnel after US Federal Trade Commission rule
